languages.text: "Хорошо. Я не буду вмешиваться в расследование — оповестите меня, когда найдете виновника".
"Very well. In that case, I will take no part in this investigation. Notify me once you have found the culprit."
languages.original_text: "Хорошо. Я не буду вмешиваться в расследование — оповестите меня, когда найдете виновника".

traits.locale_text: "Very well. In that case, I will take no part in this investigation. Inform me when you have found the culprit."
"Very well. In that case, I will take no part in this investigation. Inform me when you have found the culprit."
"Very well. In that case, I shall take no part in this investigation. Notify me once you have found the culprit."
"Very well. In that case, I shall take no part in this investigation. Notify me once you have found the culprit."
"Very well. In that case, I will take no part in this investigation. Notify me once you have found the culprit."
"Very well. In that case, I will take no part in this investigation. Notify me once you have found the culprit."

languages.text: «Muy bien. En ese caso, no participaré en la investigación. Notifíqueme en cuanto encuentre al culpable».
languages.original_text: "Very well. In that case, I will take no part in this investigation. Notify me once you have found the culprit."

traits.locale_text: «Muy bien. En ese caso, no participaré en la investigación. Notifíqueme en cuanto encuentre al culpable».

languages.text: 「いいだろう。それであれば、捜査にはかかわらないことにしよう。犯人がわかりしだい知らせるように」
languages.original_text: "Very well. In that case, I will take no part in this investigation. Notify me once you have found the culprit."

traits.locale_text: 「いいだろう。それであれば、捜査にはかかわらないことにしよう。犯人がわかりしだい知らせるように」

languages.text: “好吧，既然这样，我就不参与这场调查了。一旦找到罪魁祸首，记得立刻通知我。”
languages.original_text: "Very well. In that case, I will take no part in this investigation. Notify me once you have found the culprit."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，既然这样，我就不参与这场调查了。一旦找到罪魁祸首，记得立刻通知我。”

languages.text: "Nun gut. In diesem Fall werde ich nicht an dieser Untersuchung teilnehmen. Erstattet Bericht, wenn Ihr den Täter gefunden habt."
languages.original_text: "Very well. In that case, I will take no part in this investigation. Notify me once you have found the culprit."

traits.locale_text: "Nun gut. In diesem Fall werde ich nicht an dieser Untersuchung teilnehmen. Erstattet Bericht, wenn Ihr den Täter gefunden habt."

languages.text: « Très bien. Dans ce cas, je ne participerai pas à l'enquête. Contentez-vous de m'informer dès que vous aurez trouvé le coupable. »
languages.original_text: "Very well. In that case, I will take no part in this investigation. Notify me once you have found the culprit."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien. Dans ce cas, je ne participerai pas à l'enquête. Contentez-vous de m'informer dès que vous aurez trouvé le coupable. »

languages.text: "Pekâlâ. Öyleyse bu incelemede rol almayacağım. Fail bulunduğunda beni haberdar edersin."
languages.original_text: "Very well. In that case, I will take no part in this investigation. Notify me once you have found the culprit."
